name: The Adventure of NAYU
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
◆ STORY ◆
Enjoy the little adventure of Nayu the fox.
Playing time : 20-30 minutes

◆ ENDLESS ◆
You will be able to play after completing the 'Story'.
I just keep hit away and moving forward.
Even if left alone, it will go on and on.
This is the perfect mode to get your hands on a 'Shards of Star' or to increase your level.
Playing time : As much as you like

◆ BONUS ◆
- Path to the Cheese -
You will be able to play after completing the 'Story'.
A simple mini-game to collect the cheese.
